channel.title: Project 16 v6 Bug Fix help!
channel.description: Hi, i know how to fix the bank bug, but how can i fix that non working mining and woodcutting? Thx for help. :)

item.title: Project 16 v6 Bug Fix help!
item.dc:creator: @ethan795 ethan795
item.description:
@ethan795 wrote:

[quote=“Bammer, post:4, topic:16208”]Search for

else if (command.startsWith("bank"))

it should look something like this:

	//else if (command.startsWith("bank"))
     //if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) 
     //{
     //sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy.");
     //}
   //  else
//	{
//		openUpBank();
//	}

Now replace that whole code with this:

	else if (command.startsWith("bank"))
     if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) 
     {
     sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy.");
     }
     else
	{
		openUpBank();
	}

Compile then you’ve got yourself a working bank :)[/quote]

Read his post…he says he knows how to fix the bank.

Read full topic

item.title: Project 16 v6 Bug Fix help!
item.dc:creator: @Bammer Bammer
item.description:
@Bammer wrote:

Search for

else if (command.startsWith("bank"))

it should look something like this:

	//else if (command.startsWith("bank"))
     //if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) 
     //{
     //sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy.");
     //}
   //  else
//	{
//		openUpBank();
//	}

Now replace that whole code with this:

	else if (command.startsWith("bank"))
     if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) 
     {
     sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy.");
     }
     else
	{
		openUpBank();
	}

Compile then you’ve got yourself a working bank
